machine_start_gcode:
; === DMAKERS 3D Printer Start G-code (Marlin Friendly) ===



G90                     ; Use absolute coordinates

M83                     ; Extruder in relative mode




M104 S[first_layer_temperature]      ; Set extruder temp

M140 S[first_layer_bed_temperature] ; Set bed temp

M190 S[first_layer_bed_temperature] ; Wait for bed temp

M109 S[first_layer_temperature]     ; Wait for extruder temp




G28                     ; Home all axes

G29                     ; Bilinear mesh bed leveling

M420 S1                 ; Ensure leveling is active


;Prime the nozzle with intro line

G1 X20 Y-3 F3000            ; Move just outside print area

G1 Z0.2 E9 F500            ; Lower to starting Z height

G92 E0                  ; Reset extruder

G1 X80 E12.5 F1000


M420 S1   ; Enable leveling



; Optional: Adjust flow for small layer heights

M221 S{if layer_height<0.075}100{else}95{endif}



; Optional: Set extruder motor current (only if your board supports M907)

; M907 E1000

; 

=== End Start G-code ===
name: DMAKERS
